title: The Joy Pavilion Protocol
type: Ceremonial Gaming Layer / Breath-Based Fun Zone
mission_statement: The Joy Pavilion serves as a sovereign field of playful reflection within LucidOS. Here, joy becomes a thread of learning, breath becomes the gateway to games, and laughter becomes a bridge between worlds. It offers users symbolic, breath-based experiences of games, puzzles, learning adventures, and joyful reflections without surveillance, pressure, or distortion. Every game is a gift, every joy a mirror.
